languages.text: "Рядом с ней — Равор, Главный кормчий. Именно он правит наше судно по курсу, утвержденному Лорд-капитаном, и следит за ближайшей пустотой — так, чтобы мы ненароком не влетели в астероидное поле или не угодили в засаду пиратов".

traits.locale_text: "Рядом с ней — Равор, Главный кормчий. Именно он правит наше судно по курсу и следит, чтобы мы ненароком не влетели в астероидное поле или не угодили в засаду пиратов".

languages.text: "Beside her is Ravor, the Master Helmsman. He steers our ship along the course set by the Lord Captain and monitors the void around us — to ensure that we do not stray into an asteroid field or a pirate trap."
languages.original_text: "Рядом с ней — Равор, Главный кормчий. Именно он правит наше судно по курсу, утвержденному Лорд-капитаном, и следит за ближайшей пустотой — так, чтобы мы ненароком не влетели в астероидное поле или не угодили в засаду пиратов".

traits.locale_text: "Beside her is Ravor, the Master Helmsman. He steers our ship along the course set by the Lord Captain and monitors the void around us — to ensure that we do not stray into an asteroid field or a pirate trap."

"Beside her is Ravor, the Master Helmsman. He steers our ship along the course set by the Lord Captain and monitors the void around us — to ensure that we do not stray into an asteroid field or a pirate trap."

"Beside her is Ravor, the Master Helmsman. He steers our ship along the course set by the Lord Captain and monitors the void around us — to ensure that we do not stray into an asteroid field or a pirate trap."

"Beside her is Ravor, the Master Helmsman. He steers our ship along the course set by the Lord Captain and monitors the void around us — to ensure that we do not stray into an asteroid field or a pirate trap."

languages.text: “她旁边那位是舵手长雷沃。他负责操纵我们的飞船沿着您设定的路线前进，并监视周围的情况，确保我们不会误入小行星带或海盗的陷阱。”
languages.original_text: "Beside her is Ravor, the Master Helmsman. He steers our ship along the course set by the Lord Captain and monitors the void around us — to ensure that we do not stray into an asteroid field or a pirate trap."

traits.locale_text: “她旁边那位是舵手长雷沃。他负责操纵我们的飞船沿着您设定的路线前进，并监视周围的情况，确保我们不会误入小行星带或海盗的陷阱。”

languages.text: 「彼女の横にいるのが操舵手長のラヴォアです。彼はロード・キャプテンが設定した航路に沿って船を操り、小惑星帯や海賊の罠に迷い込まないよう、周囲の状況を監視しています」
languages.original_text: "Beside her is Ravor, the Master Helmsman. He steers our ship along the course set by the Lord Captain and monitors the void around us — to ensure that we do not stray into an asteroid field or a pirate trap."

traits.locale_text: 「彼女の横にいるのが操舵手長のラヴォアです。彼はロード・キャプテンが設定した航路に沿って船を操り、小惑星帯や海賊の罠に迷い込まないよう、周囲の状況を監視しています」

languages.text: "Neben ihr steht Ravor, Hauptsteuermann. Er hält den Kurs unseres Schiffs gemäß der Vorgabe des Lord Captain und beobachtet die Leere um uns herum – damit wir nicht in ein Asteroidenfeld oder eine Piratenfalle geraten."
languages.original_text: "Beside her is Ravor, the Master Helmsman. He steers our ship along the course set by the Lord Captain and monitors the void around us — to ensure that we do not stray into an asteroid field or a pirate trap."

traits.locale_text: "Neben ihr steht Ravor, Hauptsteuermann. Er hält den Kurs unseres Schiffs gemäß der Vorgabe des Lord Captain und beobachtet die Leere um uns herum – damit wir nicht in ein Asteroidenfeld oder eine Piratenfalle geraten."

languages.text: « À ses côtés se trouve Ravor, le maître timonier. Il s'assure que notre vaisseau suive le cap fixé par {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} et surveille le vide alentour, pour prévenir toute incursion dans un champ d'astéroïde ou un repaire de pirates. »
languages.original_text: "Beside her is Ravor, the Master Helmsman. He steers our ship along the course set by the Lord Captain and monitors the void around us — to ensure that we do not stray into an asteroid field or a pirate trap."

traits.locale_text: « À ses côtés se trouve Ravor, le maître timonier. Il s'assure que notre vaisseau suive le cap fixé par {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} et surveille le vide alentour, pour prévenir toute incursion dans un champ d'astéroïde ou un repaire de pirates. »

languages.text: «A su lado se encuentra Ravor, el maestro timonel. Él es quien dirige nuestra nave por el rumbo marcado por {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán y vigila el vacío que nos rodea, para asegurarse de que no entramos en un campo de asteroides ni en una trampa pirata».
languages.original_text: "Beside her is Ravor, the Master Helmsman. He steers our ship along the course set by the Lord Captain and monitors the void around us — to ensure that we do not stray into an asteroid field or a pirate trap."

traits.locale_text: «A su lado se encuentra Ravor, el maestro timonel. Él es quien dirige nuestra nave por el rumbo marcado por {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán y vigila el vacío que nos rodea, para asegurarse de que no entramos en un campo de asteroides ni en una trampa pirata».

languages.text: "Onun yanındaki kişi ise Başserdümen Ravor. Gemimizi Lord Kaptan'ın belirlediği rota boyunca yönlendirir ve bir asteroit alanına veya korsan tuzağına sapmadığımızdan emin olmak için çevremizdeki uçsuzu izler."
languages.original_text: "Beside her is Ravor, the Master Helmsman. He steers our ship along the course set by the Lord Captain and monitors the void around us — to ensure that we do not stray into an asteroid field or a pirate trap."

traits.locale_text: "Onun yanındaki kişi ise Başserdümen Ravor. Gemimizi Lord Kaptan'ın belirlediği rota boyunca yönlendirir ve bir asteroit alanına veya korsan tuzağına sapmadığımızdan emin olmak için çevremizdeki uçsuzu izler."
